description: [Status: stable] [Name: string-dot-format-missing-arguments] [Message: .format call is missing argument(s) for placeholder(s): {message}] What it does Checks for str.format calls with placeholders that are missing arguments. Why is this bad? In str.format calls, omitting arguments for placeholders will raise a KeyError at runtime. Example "{greeting}, {name}".format(name="World") Use instead: "{greeting}, {name}".format(greeting="Hello", name="World")
